entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Arviat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:13 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 35.
